패키지 java.rmi.server 계층

패키지 계층:
모든 패키지

클래스 계층

  • java.lang. Object
    • java.rmi.server. ObjID (implements java.io. Serializable )
    • java.rmi.server. Operation
    • java.io. OutputStream (implements java.io. Closeable, java.io. Flushable )
      • java.io. FilterOutputStream
        • java.io. PrintStream (implements java.lang. Appendable, java.io. Closeable )
          • java.rmi.server. LogStream
    • java.rmi.server. RemoteObject (implements java.rmi. Remote, java.io. Serializable )
      • java.rmi.server. RemoteObjectInvocationHandler (implements java.lang.reflect. InvocationHandler )
      • java.rmi.server. RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server. UnicastRemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server. RemoteStub
    • java.rmi.server. RMIClassLoader
    • java.rmi.server. RMIClassLoaderSpi
    • java.rmi.server. RMISocketFactory (implements java.rmi.server. RMIClientSocketFactory, java.rmi.server. RMIServerSocketFactory )
    • java.lang. Throwable (implements java.io. Serializable )
      • java.lang. Exception
        • java.lang. CloneNotSupportedException
          • java.rmi.server. ServerCloneException
        • java.io. IOException
          • java.rmi. RemoteException
            • java.rmi.server. ExportException
              • java.rmi.server. SocketSecurityException
            • java.rmi.server. SkeletonMismatchException
            • java.rmi.server. SkeletonNotFoundException
        • java.rmi.server. ServerNotActiveException
    • java.rmi.server. UID (implements java.io. Serializable )

인터페이스 계층

  • java.rmi.server. LoaderHandler
  • java.rmi.server. RemoteCall
  • java.rmi.server. RMIClientSocketFactory
  • java.rmi.server. RMIFailureHandler
  • java.rmi.server. RMIServerSocketFactory
  • java.io. Serializable
    • java.io. Externalizable
      • java.rmi.server. RemoteRef
        • java.rmi.server. ServerRef
  • java.rmi.server. Skeleton
  • java.rmi.server. Unreferenced
